title: Sandbox Mode??
body: Just wondering how do I enter sandbox mode since I see all these youtubers doing experiments etc. pls help

replies.body: Then how do youtubers get their hands on it
I think theres a magical server in which you can have access to stuff early, a lot of people talk about it, apparently its called the P-B-E

I feel like they may be given special promo codes, because I had a friend that was given a code giving him access to a region that had a select few that could use the rework fizz, that was a while ago tho so I'm not sure if it's chaneged?
Yes. The magical land of P-B-E.
